name: fleet-management-system
description: Fleet Management System for Malawi Judiciary - Web + Mobile

scripts.install-workspaces: npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=web && npm install --workspace=mobile
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=backend" "npm run dev --workspace=web" "npm run dev --workspace=mobile"
scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ui" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=web && npm run build --workspace=mobile
scripts.test: npm test --workspace=backend && npm test --workspace=web && npm test --workspace=mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=web && npm run lint --workspace=mobile
